basis: The user expresses concrete intent and a thorough plan (scheduled reminders, micro-habit steps, fallback). However, there is no explicit, verifiable record of past execution in this chat, so while the plan is strong, actual follow-through remains moderately uncertain. A cautious mid-range action estimate is warranted.
coaching_notes: Encourage concrete quick-start actions and simple tracking. Recommend logging hunger ratings/triggers daily, using the fallback reminder on tougher days, and validating progress with a brief weekly check-in. Consider adding a tiny environmental cue (e.g., water bottle placement) to reduce friction. Plan a clear, single-step review after one week to decide whether to keep or adjust times and reminders.
